org.apache.mesos.config

Interface ConfigurationValidation


  • public interface ConfigurationValidation
    The ConfigurationValidation interface should be implemented by any class which intend to validate a new Configuration w.r.t. an old Configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ConfigurationValidationError> validate(Configuration oldConfig, Configuration newConfig)
      Returns List of ConfigurationValidationError for the newly supplied Configuration object.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        java.util.List<ConfigurationValidationError> validate(Configuration oldConfig,
                                                      Configuration newConfig)
        Returns List of ConfigurationValidationError for the newly supplied Configuration object. A validation can validate a newConfig in following ways: 1. Validate newConfig parameters against the oldConfig paramater. Ex: If DiskType was ROOT in oldConfig, then it cannot be changed to, ex: MOUNT, in the newConfig. 2. Validate just newConfig parameter(s). Ex: CPU value > 0
        Parameters:
        oldConfig - Currently persisted Configuration.
        newConfig - Proposed new Configuration
        Returns:
        List of errors, or an empty list if validation passed
